text:

Change Emoji Icon
created <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="ocreated" placeholder="ğŸ‘‰" tag="input"/>

"},"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle":{"title":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" tag="div" retain="yes" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[all[current]has[creator]]"> <$avatar width=16 link="https://github.com/oeyoews" /> {{!!creator}}  <$list filter="[all[current]has[created]]"> <$text text={{{[get[ocreated]else[ğŸ‘‰]]}}} /> created <$view field="created" format="date" template="YYYY/0MM/0DD"/>   <$list filter="[all[current]has[modified]]"> <$text text={{{[get[omodified]else[ğŸ“]]}}} /> modified <$view field="modified" format="relativedate" />   <$list filter="[all[current]has[description]]"> <$text text={{{[get[odescription]else[âœ…]]}}} /> {{!!description}}    <$list filter="[!is[system]!days:created[-300]] -[days:modified[-300]]" > <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]has[created]]"> ğŸ¤– æ­¤æ¡ç›®åˆ›å»ºäº <$view field="created" format="date" template="YYYY/0MM/0DD"/> <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]has[modified]]"> , ä¿®æ”¹äº <$view field="modified" format="relativedate" /> , å†…å®¹å¯èƒ½å·²ç»ä¸å¤Ÿå‡†ç¡®ï¼Œ è¯·é…Œæƒ…å‚è€ƒ âš ï¸   <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]!is[binary]]"> <>
"},"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags":{"title":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"
<$list filter="[all[current]tags[]limit[1]sort[title]]"> <$text text={{{ [[$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config]get[otags]else[ğŸ·ï¸]] }}} /> <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" storyview="pop"/>
